title: Space Cats Battle Arena
description: Space Cats Battle Arena brings an action-packed fusion of space shooter and battle arena genres. Create your unique space battleship by merging blocks with an array of weapons, armor, generators, lasers, rockets, and more. Engage in thrilling PvP duels in the cool arena of war strategy. Unlock new technologies, craft loot, and build your dream battleship. Customize your ship for speed, power, or impenetrable defenses using different blocks with unique abilities. With 14 maps, 35 types of weapons, blocks, and devices, the outer space sandbox war strategy offers endless possibilities. Challenge your friend to PvP battles and immerse yourself in the mayhem space shooter war. Take command, launch your powerful ship, and dominate the master duel space battle!
